name: Show Jumping Premium
description:
London, Sydney, Hong Kong and Paris: they all want you! Show your skills in show jumping and take part in international tournaments. Bring home first place and take care of your horses. You are a team. Are you ready for the next course?

***The second installment in the successful HorseWorld series***
Following HorseWorld 3D comes HorseWorld: Show Jumping as the next great horse simulation for you to discover and enjoy! Improved graphics and even more exciting riding courses make this app a must-have for any horse lover.

***Equip your horses***
Each of your horses deserves its very own special equipment! Discover various saddles, saddle pads, bridles and leg wraps. Don’t forget to customize your mighty steed’s mane according to your taste! Happy with your new gear? Then make the most of it at the next tournament!

***Build and create your own jumping courses!***
You’re through with the boring old jumping course on the ranch – now it’s time for you and your horses to explore the world! Big cities like Paris and New York await you and your talent on challenging courses. Demonstrate great timing and your love of horses, and win every tournament in the world!

***Jump into a brand new world***
If you are fed up with the big city life, you can retire to the mysterious Fantasy Island. Red mushrooms, magical waterfalls and an exciting course await you here. Here's an idea: Try out this jumping course with the magical unicorn.

***Care for your horses before tackling the course***
Your dear horses can only do their best if they’re taken care of, so you’ve got to fulfill their needs and wishes. Feeding, brushing, and combing are all on the agenda, but of course there’s also time for some cuddles! After lots of fun out in the meadow, the course will be no problem for the two of you.

* Demonstrate your skills in the world’s biggest tournaments
* Design and build your very own jumping courses!
* Various beautiful horses, such as Hannoverians, English Thoroughbreds, Arabians and Andalusians, are just waiting for you to care for them!
* Customize your horses’ equipment and manes!
* A magical world is waiting to be discovered by you: experience magical moments with the unicorn on Fantasy Island.

Jump in the saddle and let’s go! Download HorseWorld: Show Jumping and try out the challenging courses.

Tivola’s premium games offer players endless gaming fun with their favorite animals, without any in-app purchases, annoying ads, or external links. This is why premium games are perfectly suited for even our littlest animal fans. For a set price, you can get all the content and all the objects in the game from the start – just waiting to be played with! What are you waiting for? Let’s start playing!
